subject: Sales
title: Tom Hopkins: The Champion's Mindset
description: One-minute skill: Tom Hopkins: The Champion's Mindset.

hook.text: Tom Hopkins failed his real estate exam twice. Then he outsold every agent in America.

buildup.text: He invested his last $150 in a sales seminar. That single bet changed his entire career overnight.

discovery.text: Hopkins mastered asking questions. He believed the right question closes any deal.

twist.text: His book trained more salespeople than most MBA programs. Practice and scripts beat theory.

climax.text: He turned failure into a system. Every rejection was data and every loss was a lesson.

punchline.text: The best sales trainer started as the worst student.

quiz.question: What did Tom Hopkins invest his last $150 in?
